message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I think this is a good starting point for negotiations.
Your offer was generous Alice, but I think this split is more reflective of the decreasing value over time.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I came down from my previous offer, acknowledging the time factor.  This is a fair deal.
Alice, we're running out of time.  This offer benefits us both, considering the shrinking pot.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money with every passing round. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.
